scripts.setup: npm install -g typescript pm2 prisma && npm run prisma:push && npm install && npm run setup:py; npm start
scripts.setup:py: python3 -m venv settings/venv && settings/venv/bin/pip install rembg onnxruntime
scripts.update: git pull origin master; npm update --save; deno upgrade; bun upgrade; npm run update:py; npm run postinstall
scripts.postinstall: rm package-lock.json & npm run prisma:gen && npm run build
scripts.dev: npx pm2 delete walle; deno run --watch -A -c settings/deno.jsonc plugin/copilot.ts
scripts.translate: npx @parvineyvazov/json-translator locale/pt.json -m google -f pt -t en es fr pl
